page.title: 02THE GENERAL SURVEY 2
page.content:
{SETTLEMENT}-Part of Tibberton has some very old houses, some date back to before Tudor times.There is also an old church which is 150 years old.The only shop in the village is the Post Office which sells most things needed.
{LEISURE}-Around the motorway,there is a rugby club and a scrambling course.
{HEDGES AND BUSHES(VEGETATION)}-There are many hedges and bushes, mainly on the Eastern side by the ridge.The vegetaton is plentiful in the area.In the hedges we found wild plants growing.Some examples are dogroses,ivy and also a lot of hawthorn and some bramble bushes.
